sentences: Michael Calfan (born (1990-11-12)12 November 1990) is a French DJ and house music producer from Paris.
Calfan was born in 1990 in Paris, France.
In 2008, he was discovered by Bob Sinclar who was also noted as one of the most promising artists of his label Yellow Productions.

In 2014, he released the single "Prelude" through Spinnin' Records (which entered the Billboard Dance/Mix Show Airplay) and "Treasured Soul", which reached number 17 in the singles chart in the United Kingdom in April 2015.
